dialog_lines.line: Good to meet ya! After that trip, I bet you can see why we need those weapons.
Flock Haven is known for its mead. No one can resist its sweet honey taste.
We always have shipping demands for our largest export.
I believe there was a delivery need for some mead to Squid City. We could even upgrade your ship as payment!
I'll double check the roster and hook you up with some work.
Oh, and while you are in the city you should check out some of their pie shops. They have apple, peach, cherry, bluuuuueberry.
